ca.CounterclaimStartDate = #{counterclaimStartDate}, ca.CounterclaimEndDate = #{counterclaimEndDate},
ca.NegotiationStartDate = #{negotiationStartDate}, ca.NegotiationEndDate = #{negotiationEndDate},
